00011 // plastic.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "material.h"
00014 // Plastic Class Declarations
00015 class Plastic : public Material {
00016 public:
00017         // Plastic Public Methods
00018         Plastic(Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > kd,
00019                         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > ks,
00020                         Reference<Texture<float> > rough,
00021                         Reference<Texture<float> > bump) {
00022                 Kd = kd;
00023                 Ks = ks;
00024                 roughness = rough;
00025                 bumpMap = bump;
00026         }
00027         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom,
00028                       const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const;
00029 private:
00030         // Plastic Private Data
00031         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kd, Ks;
00032         Reference<Texture<float> > roughness, bumpMap;
00033 };
00034 // Plastic Method Definitions
00035 BSDF *Plastic::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom,
00036                 const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00037         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00038         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00039         if (bumpMap)
00040                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00041         else
00042                 dgs = dgShading;
00043         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00044         Spectrum kd = Kd->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00045         BxDF *diff = BSDF_ALLOC(Lambertian)(kd);
00046         Fresnel *fresnel =
00047                 BSDF_ALLOC(FresnelDielectric)(1.5f, 1.f);
00048         Spectrum ks = Ks->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00049         float rough = roughness->Evaluate(dgs);
00050         BxDF *spec = BSDF_ALLOC(Microfacet)(ks, fresnel,
00051                 BSDF_ALLOC(Blinn)(1.f / rough));
00052         bsdf->Add(diff);
00053         bsdf->Add(spec);
00054         return bsdf;
00055 }
00056 // Plastic Dynamic Creation Routine
00057 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00058                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00059         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kd = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Kd", Spectrum(1.f));
00060         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Ks = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Ks", Spectrum(1.f));
00061         Reference<Texture<float> > roughness = mp.GetFloatTexture("roughness", .1f);
00062         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00063         return new Plastic(Kd, Ks, roughness, bumpMap);
00064 }
